name: deploy
description: github action to deploy build artifacts to server by ssh and scp

scripts.build.clean: ncc build src/index.ts --license licenses.txt --minify --out dist/clean && mv dist/clean/index.js dist/clean.js
scripts.build: ncc build src/index.ts --license licenses.txt --minify && npm run build.clean
scripts.tag: git push --delete origin v1.0 && git tag -d v1.0 && git tag -a -m 'deploy' v1.0 &&  git push --follow-tags
